document.full_text: the berklee college of music, based in boston, is opening its first overseas campus, in valencia, spain, with the aim of propelling european music education traditions into the 21st century.
document.title: berklee to open a campus in spain
lines_and_colors: the berklee college of music, based in boston, is opening its first overseas campus, in valencia, spain, with the aim of propelling european music education traditions into the 21st century.
